title: Cost effectiveness of early cancer surveillance

title_detail.value: Cost effectiveness of early cancer surveillance

summary: New research shows how early cancer screening and surveillance in patients with Li-Fraumeni syndrome (LFS) results in additional years of life, and is cost effective for third-party payers.

summary_detail.value: New research shows how early cancer screening and surveillance in patients with Li-Fraumeni syndrome (LFS) results in additional years of life, and is cost effective for third-party payers.
